page.title: 15Fire Station, Paddock Wood
page.content: The fire station is not a very big one and has only one fire engine.The engine is called out to fires and other emergencies in Paddock Wood,Five Oak Green,East Peckham,Capel and Yalding and the surrounding areas. The fire engine weighs over ten tons and can carry 1800 litres of water. The firemen do not stay at the fire station all day,nor do they sleep overnight. There are fourteen firemen and two junior firemen. There is a practice drill every Thursday. All the rooms in the fire station are on ground level. hen a fireman says there is a'shout' When a fireman says there is a 'shout' he means there is a fire and all the firemen are quickly contacted. There should be six men attending a fire,but if only three men arrive they must go.
